text: “Kɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God, kɨ kamaghɨn mɨgɨa ghaze, Dughiam izɨtɨ, kɨ Atrivim Devitɨn adarazir tongɨn, gumazir aghui tam amɨsevegham. Eghtɨ a Temer Ghuzir Igiam temer dakamɨn otogha aghui moghɨn ikiam. Gumazir kam atrivimɨn ikɨ, nɨghnɨzir aghuim ikɨ, ingangarim damuam. Egh guizɨn arazimɨn gɨn mangɨ nguazir kamɨn gumazamiziba arazir aghuibar me damuam.
